CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Prototype Development stage positioned above or below the Project Initiation stage?
SRP.A: The Prototype Development stage is positioned {below} the Project Initiation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Market Release?
VE.A: The value of stage Market Release is {23%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Production?
VE.A: The value of stage Production is {34%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Project Initiation, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Market Release, with a value of {23%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Prototype Development to stage Testing and Validation?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Prototype Development to stage Testing and Validation is {14%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Project Initiation to stage Design Phase?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Project Initiation to stage Design Phase is {14%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 67%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Project Initiation} stage has {100%}, the {Design Phase} stage has {86%}, the {Prototype Development} stage has {74%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 40%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Production} stage has {34%}, the {Market Release} stage has {23%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 40% and 80%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Prototype Development} stage has {74%}, the {Testing and Validation} stage has {60%}, the {Final Design Approval} stage has {47%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Project Initiation to Design Phase, or from stage Final Design Approval to Production?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Project Initiation} to {Design Phase} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Final Design Approval to Production, or from stage Production to Market Release?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Final Design Approval} to {Production} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Testing and Validation to Final Design Approval, from stage Prototype Development to Testing and Validation, or from stage Final Design Approval to Production?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Prototype Development} to stage {Testing and Validation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Project Initiation} and {Design Phase} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Production} and {Market Release} stages.
